column1: vincent_vda,"2008-12-30T16:14:22.653Z","Free figure","Pointless figure aside that it was FREE!

As a minifig it can be used as some sort of guardian statue, but the design of the normal minifigs is better. The shield can be used in your creations as it sports the traditional lego attachment (the only refference to Lego at all).
3 rating because of the statue use and the useful shield...

Matt_Vader,"2010-11-14T09:19:09.073Z","Ummmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm","

Like I said in the title I don't really get it. It is free but it sooooooooooo small.
Can use shield as surf board (why? I don't know)
A free set which you can use in different ways
